com.gemstone.gemfire.cache

Class MirrorType

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.MirrorType
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.io.Serializable
    Deprecated. 
    as of GemFire 5.0, use DataPolicy instead.

    @Deprecated
public class MirrorType
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.io.Serializable
    Enumerated type for region mirroring.
    Since:
    3.0
    See Also:
    AttributesFactory.setMirrorType(com.gemstone.gemfire.cache.MirrorType), RegionAttributes.getMirrorType(), Serialized Form

    • Field Detail

      • NONE

        @Deprecated
public static final MirrorType NONE
        Deprecated. as of GemFire 5.0, use DataPolicy.NORMAL instead.
        New entries created in other caches for this region are not automatically propagated to this region in this cache.

      • KEYS

        @Deprecated
public static final MirrorType KEYS
        Deprecated. as of GemFire 5.0, use DataPolicy.REPLICATE instead.
        New entries created in other caches for this region are propagated to this region in this cache, but the value is not necessarily copied to this cache with the key.

      • KEYS_VALUES

        @Deprecated
public static final MirrorType KEYS_VALUES
        Deprecated. as of GemFire 5.0, use DataPolicy.REPLICATE instead.
        New entries created in other caches for this region are propagated to this region in this cache and the value is also copied to this cache.

      • ordinal

        public final int ordinal
        Deprecated. 
        int used as ordinal to represent this Scope
